SELECT A.* ,TO_CHAR(A.INS_INIT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS INS_INIT_DATE_VIEW ,TO_CHAR(A.STND_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS STND_DT_VIEW ,TO_CHAR(A.STND_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS STND_DT_KEY ,TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS REG_DATE_VIEW ,ROUND((A.REG_DATE - A.STND_DT),0) - TO_NUMBER(NVL(B.DATA1,0)) || ' 일 경과' AS COLDIFF FROM TB_CL_HT_DRIVING A ,(SELECT DATA1 FROM TB_CM_MT_PARAMETER WHERE PARAM_ID = 'dirving_eff_date') B WHERE 1=1
A.STND_DT = TO_DATE(#sStdDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
A.TMP_RACE_NUMBER = #sTmpNo#
A.TMP_RACE_AGENCY LIKE '%'||#sTmpAg#||'%'
A.STND_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE( #stdate# || ' 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE( #eddate# || ' 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
ORDER BY A.REG_DATE DESC

SELECT A.* ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.DRIVING_DIST_MON, 'YYYY-MM'), 'YYYY-MM') AS DRIVING_DIST_MON_VIEW FROM TB_CL_HT_AUTODRIVING A WHERE 1=1 AND A.TMP_RACE_NUMBER = #sTmpNo# AND A.STND_DT = TO_DATE(#sStdDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ORDER BY A.DRIVING_DIST_MON

SELECT A.* ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.CTR_CHANGE_MON, 'YYYY-MM'), 'YYYY-MM') AS CTR_CHANGE_MON_VIEW FROM TB_CL_HT_CTRCHANGE A WHERE 1=1 AND A.TMP_RACE_NUMBER = #sTmpNo# AND A.STND_DT = TO_DATE(#sStdDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ORDER BY A.CTR_CHANGE_MON

SELECT A.* ,TO_CHAR(A.CTR_CHANGE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS CTR_CHANGE_DATE_VIEW FROM TB_CL_HT_CTRCHANGEDETAIL A WHERE 1=1 AND A.TMP_RACE_NUMBER = #sTmpNo# AND A.STND_DT = TO_DATE(#sStdDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ORDER BY A.CTR_CHANGE_DATE

SELECT A.* ,TO_CHAR(A.INS_INIT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS INS_INIT_DATE_VIEW ,TO_CHAR(A.STND_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS STND_DT_VIEW ,TO_CHAR(A.STND_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS STND_DT_KEY ,TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS REG_DATE_VIEW ,ROUND((A.REG_DATE - A.STND_DT),0) - TO_NUMBER(NVL(B.DATA1,0)) || ' 일 경과' AS COLDIFF FROM TB_CL_HT_DRIVING A ,(SELECT DATA1 FROM TB_CM_MT_PARAMETER WHERE PARAM_ID = 'dirving_eff_date') B WHERE 1=1
A.TMP_RACE_NUMBER = #sTmpNo#
A.TMP_RACE_AGENCY LIKE '%'||#sTmpAg#||'%'
A.STND_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE( #stdate# || ' 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE( #eddate# || ' 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
ORDER BY A.REG_DATE DESC
